name: Heroes of Agora
description: Multiplayer online 3rd person PvP combat arena featuring both ranged and melee style combat. Key features : a variety of characters to choose from all with unique attacks and combos, 2-8 players in one arena, multiple different arena sizes and themes, many different character designs each with their own personality and style, great looking visuals. You can either get up close and personal with a melee character like Ol' Saint Rik and deal out the pain up close with brutal combo attacks or stay back and pick your opponents off from a distance with characters like Rampage who likes to launch rocks at his enemies.
